Brewer informed Amazon.com, Inc. that she is resigning from the Board of Directors effective February&#160;16, 2021. &#160; 3 Table of Contents SIGNATURES Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &#160; AMAZON.COM, INC.
